header.h2: April 17th - RISD Latest Coronavirus Update letter

h3.a: April 17th - RISD Latest Coronavirus Update letter
4-20-2020 Regular April Board Meeting Agenda - Zoom link

div.div: Here is the agenda for Monday's board meeting with the Zoom link for the public. If it requires a password, use: boardmtg

Packets will be available online and available for pick up. Packet pick up and drop off will be 1 day only. Tuesday, April 21st from 9 am until 9 pm. Returning packets should be placed in the appropriate grade level container located at the front entrance to the Elementary School.
Information, resources, and games for Math can be found here.
